meanings.sent1: The toy I got from the dollar store was the junkiest thing I've ever seen.
meanings.sent2: This old phone is the junkiest one in the store.
meanings.sent3: Even the junkiest items can sometimes bring joy to someone.
meanings.sent4: Her taste in clothes is so junkiest, always picking the cheapest options.
meanings.sent5: The junkiest furniture in the room was falling apart at the seams.

meanings.sent1: The garage was the junkiest place in the house, filled with old boxes and tools.
meanings.sent2: Her room was the junkiest of them all, with clothes strewn everywhere.
meanings.sent3: Despite being the junkiest room, it held a certain charm with its eclectic mix of items.
meanings.sent4: The junkiest corner of the attic held hidden treasures among the mess.
meanings.sent5: The junkiest drawer in the kitchen was a jumble of utensils and random items.

meanings.sent1: He was the junkiest collector of vintage items, always finding unique pieces.
meanings.sent2: Out of all his friends, she was the junkiest when it came to antiques.
meanings.sent3: In the world of collectors, he was known as the junkiest of them all.
meanings.sent4: Her passion for collecting made her the junkiest enthusiast in the community.
meanings.sent5: The junkiest hoarder in the neighborhood had a house full of treasures waiting to be discovered.
